topic.title: So is this supposed to be clear of censor?
topic.body: How will that work if ultimately the domain registry is handled by and can be censored by the creators of this service?

1_1yq6ABe15TborB8sGQb1pGcZgUd6eu3WJ.body:
> [lint](#comment_2_18jiuMEFFvYp1asdmcaZ8YvdjPS9aZCcfJ): The domain registry used is namecoin, "a decentralized open source information registration and transfer system based on the Bitcoin cryptocurrency." read some more at https://namecoin.info/
> Basically, without having your private key, they can't censor your domain out of the domain registry.

Thank you, that's what I wanted to know, just a matter of time before questionable content can be found here, if it isn't here already.
